scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Mark by his attribute of a winged lion, is depicted writing in an open book. He wears a purple cap and a red cloak over a purple tunic. The background is a vibrant blue fabric with gold accents, suggesting a rich or divine setting. The winged lion, a symbol of Saint Mark, is shown to the right of the saint, looking towards him. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
